title: BRAC Group ERP - Enterprise-Scale Microservices Ecosystem
description:
As part of one of the largest and most impactful organizations in Bangladesh, the BRAC Group ERP project is a comprehensive enterprise resource planning (ERP) system built using a microservices architecture. This system was designed to streamline and centralize business operations across various departments, supporting the complex and large-scale operational needs of the organization.

The ERP comprises multiple independently deployable services, including Budget Control, Fixed Asset Management, Finance & Accounting, Inventory Management, Procurement, Campus Maintenance, Fleet Management, HRMS, and Project Management. My contributions were specifically in the following modules:

  • Budget Control: Contributed to building features for planning, allocating, and monitoring departmental budgets. Developed functionalities for donor project, cost center, and activity management; budget preparation; next year’s budget planning; and budget variance analysis.
  • Fleet Management: Implemented systems for managing vehicle assignments, maintenance schedules, fuel tracking, and driver logs. Helped optimize operational efficiency through real-time status updates and centralized fleet visibility.
  • Project Management: Supported the development of a centralized platform to manage internal projects, track milestones, allocate resources, and monitor progress. Integrated approval chains and role-based task assignments to ensure accountability and timely delivery.

title: Prime Bank ERP - Enterprise-Scale Microservices Ecosystem
description:
As part of one of the largest and most impactful organizations in Bangladesh, the Prime Bank ERP project is a comprehensive enterprise resource planning (ERP) system built using a microservices architecture. This system was designed to streamline and centralize business operations across various departments, supporting complex and large-scale operational needs.

The ERP comprises multiple independently deployable services, including Procurement, Rental, and Central Dispatch. I contributed to the development of the Central Dispatch module, a mission-critical microservice designed to manage the internal and external dispatching of parcels, files, and equipment across the organization. This module enables secure, organized, and trackable delivery workflows while integrating with other ERP components.

Key Responsibilities & Features:

  • Multi-Channel Dispatching: Supported file and parcel delivery through internal messengers, external courier services, and on-demand riders.
  • Real-Time Parcel Tracking: Implemented unique parcel codes and status updates for end-to-end tracking.
  • Routing & Handoff Management: Facilitated handover approvals between sender, dispatch officer, and receiver—ensuring accountability.
  • Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Restricted actions based on user roles, including Initiator, Approver, Dispatcher, and Receiver.
  • File Sharing & Logging: Enabled sending and receiving of physical documents and files with detailed history logs for audit trails.
  • Notification System: Integrated alerts for dispatch updates, approvals, and exceptions.
  • Scalable & Modular Architecture: Developed as an independently deployable microservice, maintaining its own database, services, and APIs.

title: NestJS REST API Starter – Clean Architecture & Best Practices
description: This portfolio-ready project showcases clean architecture, modular structure, and best practices for building maintainable and enterprise-grade backend services. It includes robust features like routing, middleware, dependency injection, global error handling, environment-based configuration, and more — making it ideal for real-world applications and personal branding.

title: React TypeScript Frontend – Scalable UI with Clean Architecture
description: A feature-rich frontend application built with React 19 and TypeScript, showcasing scalable UI architecture, TailwindCSS styling, Redux for state management, and full i18n support. The project emphasizes performance, maintainability, and best practices, with smooth integration to REST APIs, modular code, and an optimized Vite build setup for modern web development.

title: Express TypeScript REST API Starter – Clean Architecture & Best Practices
description: A modern and scalable Node.js REST API built with TypeScript and Express. This portfolio-ready project demonstrates clean architecture principles, modular code organization, and best practices for maintainable backend development. Includes features like routing, middleware, error handling, and environment configuration — ideal for real-world applications and personal branding.

title: Amani Forged - E-commerce
description:
A comprehensive web-based application designed to deliver a seamless and engaging online shopping experience using a modular architecture.

  • Client Side: Features product filtering, secure user authentication, 3D Wheel Customization, and an automated abandoned cart funnel.
  • Admin Panel: Includes NetSuite ERP auto-syncing, Amazon S3 image hosting, and dynamic email template builders.
  • DevOps: Implemented containerization with Docker and CI/CD pipelines via GitHub Actions.

title: InFlow
description:
A comprehensive web and mobile platform for corporate management and card issuance, focusing on secure access and operational efficiency.

  • Implemented OTP-based secure authentication and company onboarding workflows.
  • Developed systems for issuing and managing physical/virtual cards with PayTabs integration.
  • Built OCR-based receipt parsing functionalities using NanoNets.

title: Resono
description:
An interactive Online Quiz System designed for web and iOS to manage and conduct quizzes with real-time performance analytics.

  • Built complex quiz widgets supporting multiple question types including image and audio questions.
  • Developed instant grading, feedback mechanisms, and detailed instructor reports.

title: Smart Jobs
description:
A professional job recruitment platform connecting seekers with opportunities through advanced search and tracking tools.

  • Developed robust filtering for job seekers and application tracking for employers.
  • Implemented secure authentication and job board management systems.

title: Alpha Search
description:
A forward-thinking HRM project designed to optimize organizational performance and talent management through strategic HR initiatives.

  • Developed management tools for candidates, clients, and documentation workflows.
  • Implemented document data scraping and advanced binary search filtering.

title: Cloud Class Room
description:
A comprehensive E-Learning Management System facilitating online course administration and interactive learning.

  • Created course management for instructors including multimedia material uploads and quizzes.
  • Built features for private tuition scheduling and bulk student management.

title: Online Certification School
description:
A lightweight web application designed to enhance the online classroom experience with course organization and student scheduling.

  • Integrated PayPal gateway for subscription-based payments.
  • Developed dynamic notice boards and interactive course materials.

title: Raw Nodejs project
description:
A backend service built with pure Node.js without external NPM modules, utilizing the File System for data storage.

  • Features custom authentication, token generation, and a custom query engine.
  • Includes an automated response service for user state changes.
